title: Listen to Carly Rae Jepsen cover No Doubt's 'Don't Speak' with all the anguish it deserves | CBC Music
text:
Carly Rae Jepsen covered No Doubt's "Don't Speak" for a recently released Spotify Singles session, and the emotional weight of Gwen Stefani's 1995 lyrics hit just as heavily when recreated by the Canadian pop star.

Jepsen recorded the cover of "Don't Speak" at Electric Lady Studios in New York City, as well as another version of her single "Want You in my Room" from her recently released Dedicated album, which gives us a fun juxtaposition of Stefani's heartbreaking angst to Jepsen's all-in love song.

Listen to both of them below.
description: The new track comes from a Spotify Singles session in NYC.
